languages.text: Омыв трюмы кровью, подданные Вольного Торговца присовокупили суда к планетарному флоту.
Upon painting the ships' holds with blood, the Rogue Trader's subjects added the convoy to the planetary fleet.
languages.original_text: Омыв трюмы кровью, подданные Вольного Торговца присовокупили суда к планетарному флоту.

traits.locale_text: Upon painting the ships' holds with blood, the Rogue Trader's subjects added the convoy to the planetary fleet.

languages.text: Après avoir repeint les cales des vaisseaux à grand renfort de sang, les sujets {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} ajoutent le convoi à la flotte planétaire.
languages.original_text: Upon painting the ships' holds with blood, the Rogue Trader's subjects added the convoy to the planetary fleet.

traits.locale_text: Après avoir repeint les cales des vaisseaux à grand renfort de sang, les sujets {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} ajoutent le convoi à la flotte planétaire.

languages.text: 船倉を血で塗りつぶすと、自由開拓者の臣下たちは護衛隊を惑星艦隊に加えた。
languages.original_text: Upon painting the ships' holds with blood, the Rogue Trader's subjects added the convoy to the planetary fleet.

traits.locale_text: 船倉を血で塗りつぶすと、自由開拓者の臣下たちは護衛隊を惑星艦隊に加えた。

languages.text: 血洗这艘飞船之后，行商浪人的臣民将它编入了自己的行星舰队。
languages.original_text: Upon painting the ships' holds with blood, the Rogue Trader's subjects added the convoy to the planetary fleet.

traits.locale_text: 血洗这艘飞船之后，行商浪人的臣民将它编入了自己的行星舰队。

languages.text: Tras pintar las bodegas de las naves con sangre, los súbditos de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente incorporan el convoy a la flota planetaria.
languages.original_text: Upon painting the ships' holds with blood, the Rogue Trader's subjects added the convoy to the planetary fleet.

traits.locale_text: Tras pintar las bodegas de las naves con sangre, los súbditos de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente incorporan el convoy a la flota planetaria.

languages.text: Nachdem die Untertanen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} die Laderäume mit Blut getränkt haben, verleiben sie den Konvoi der Flotte des Planeten ein.
languages.original_text: Upon painting the ships' holds with blood, the Rogue Trader's subjects added the convoy to the planetary fleet.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem die Untertanen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} die Laderäume mit Blut getränkt haben, verleiben sie den Konvoi der Flotte des Planeten ein.

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in hizmetkârlarının kana buladığı gemi, sonrasında gezegenin filosuna eklendi.
languages.original_text: Upon painting the ships' holds with blood, the Rogue Trader's subjects added the convoy to the planetary fleet.
